LanguageData.VPE_WordofJoy.label: word of joy
LanguageData.VPE_WordofJoy.description: Speak happy, calming words to someone while using psychic suggestion to implant a joyfuzz loop in his mind. The joyfuzz will suppress uncomfortable thoughts and sensations in the target to improve mood. This has the side-effect of dulling sensation and decision-making, which reduces consciousness.
LanguageData.VPE_WordofLove.label: word of love
LanguageData.VPE_WordofLove.description: Speak about someone's romantic virtues while using psychic suggestion to implant romantic desire in the listener. For days afterward, the listener will feel psychically-induced romantic attraction towards the other person. This greatly increases opinion and makes them much more likely to attempt romantic advances and marriage proposals if they get the chance. This power can be used to connect two other people, induce love for the caster, or force oneself to love another.
LanguageData.VPE_WordofSerenity.label: word of serenity
LanguageData.VPE_WordofSerenity.description: Use calming words and psychic suggestion to end a mental break on a person or animal. The target will fall into a short psychic sleep. The psyfocus cost depends on the intensity of the target's mental break.
LanguageData.VPE_WordofInspiration.label: word of inspiration
LanguageData.VPE_WordofInspiration.description: Speak words encouraging creativity while psychically hypercharging the target's mind with new ideas. The target will experience a random inspiration appropriate to them.
LanguageData.VPE_SootheMale.label: psychic sooth (male)
LanguageData.VPE_SootheMale.description: Sends out a signal to a distant engine of happiness to begin projecting a positive psychic drone, while also manipulating an orbital amplifier that only affects males.
LanguageData.VPE_SootheFemale.label: psychic sooth (female)
LanguageData.VPE_SootheFemale.description: Sends out a signal to a distant engine of happiness to begin projecting a positive psychic drone, while also manipulating an orbital amplifier that only affects females.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.description: After a brief meditation period, induce a sense of serenity in the target that reaches maximum magnitude near the effect’s end. As the calming feeling becomes more pronounced, they will find it harder to concentrate but it is not considered a malicious action.
LanguageData.VPE_EnergyDump.label: energy dump
LanguageData.VPE_EnergyDump.description: Purges the build-up of fatigue in a nearby target and leaves them completely refreshed, in exchange the caster is left completely exhausted and needing a good nap.
LanguageData.VPE_MindWipe.label: mind wipe
LanguageData.VPE_MindWipe.description: Induce a harmless, instantaneous retrograde amnesia in the target, purging all memories, social bonds and skills acquired outside of their backstory. They also feel a strong kinship with the caster’s colony and joy at rediscovering the joys of life without commitment.
LanguageData.VPE_ReunionFarskip.label: reunion farskip
LanguageData.VPE_ReunionFarskip.description: After a short meditation period and followed by a 5-day coma, taps into a target’s bloodline to skip all living family members to their proximity, knocked out through psychic shock. However, it does nothing to change their relationships and is considered rude by all other factions.
